name: Mage Arena (HeyImJ0hn)
description:
Mage Arena is a top down arena with infinite waves with increasing enemies each wave. There are currently 3 types of enemies, starting with slimes spawning at wave 1,  goblins spawning at waves 5 and up, and skeletons spawning at waves 6 and up. This is the first game I developed and it was a great way to get into game development.

Controls

  • WASD or Arrows to move
  • Mouse to aim/shoot
  • ESC will bring up pause menu

Future features

These are some features I plan on adding in the future when I have time to do so:

  • Shop system
  • New spells
  • Pets to aid in battle
  • Bosses

I hope you enjoy playing the game as much as I did making it!

Feel free to leave feedback!
